post.description: This token serves as the authorization mechanism enabling you to submit and access Tax Documentation on behalf of the account owner. It is specifically designed for use with Account Owner and Tax Documentation endpoints and is primarily employed by customers using our W8/W9 solution.

parameters.description: The Content-Type header specifies the media type of the request payload (request body).
parameters.name: Content-Type

access_token.description: Bearer token to use on behalf of an Account Owner to access and modify their Tax Documentation.

account_owner_id.description: The TaxBit ID of the Account Owner.

grant_type.description: OAuth 2.0 grant_type. The only supported value at this time is client_credentials.

tenant_id.description: The tenant that the account owner is part of.

id.description: Your system's unique identifier for the account owner.

grant_type.description: OAuth 2.0 grant_type. The only supported value at this time is client_credentials.

tenant_id.description: The tenant that the account owner is part of.

post.summary: Get an Account Owner Scoped Bearer Token

post.description: Submits complete and clean W-9, W-8BEN, or W-8BEN-E data for an Account Owner. Each submission is immutable.

document_type.description: The document type of the collected tax documentation data

name.description: The legal name of the beneficial owner of the account

dba_name.description: The "doing business as" (DBA) or "disregarded entity" (DRE) name

tax_classification.description: The federal tax classification of name; if tax_classification != OTHER, other_tax_classification must be empty

other_tax_classification.description: The tax classification not listed; if tax_classification = OTHER, this field is required

exempt_payee_code.description: The code used to identify payees who are exempt from backup withholding

exempt_fatca_code.description: The code used to identify payees who are exempt from FATCA reporting

first_line.description: The first line of name's address; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

second_line.description: The second line of name's address

city.description: The city of name; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

state_or_province.description: The state or province of name; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

postal_code.description: The postal code of name; if country = US, this field must be 5 or 9 digits; if country = CA, this field must be in "LNLNLN", "LNL NLN", or "LNL-NLN" format; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country or stateOrProvince: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

tin.description: The U.S. tax identification number (TIN) associated with the name; the TIN must consist of 9 numerical digits, must not be sequential or repeating, must not begin with five zeros, and must not contain any alphabetic characters

tin_type.description: The type of US tax identification number; if tax_classification = INDIVIDUAL, tin_type must be SSN, ITIN, or ATIN - else, tin_type must be EIN

has_certified.description: The user has certified under penalties of perjury all necessary certifications

is_not_subject_backup_withholding.description: The user has certified that they are not subject to backup withholding

signature.description: The signed name of signor (i.e., individual authorized to sign for name); if tax_classification = INDIVIDUAL, signature must equal name

signature_timestamp.description: The date and time when the form was signed; the timestamp must be within 24 hours of the current UTC time

document_type.description: The document type of the collected tax documentation data

name.description: The legal name of the beneficial owner of the account

reference_numbers.description: The legal name of the US or foreign “disregarded entity” (DRE) owner

tax_classification.description: The federal tax classification of name

country.description: The country of citizenship of name; country must not be US

first_line.description: The first line of name's permanent address; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

second_line.description: The second line of name's permanent address

city.description: The city of name; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

state_or_province.description: The state or province of name; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

postal_code.description: The postal code of name; if country = US, this field must be 5 or 9 digits; if country = CA, this field must be in "LNLNLN", "LNL NLN", or "LNL-NLN" format; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country or stateOrProvince: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

permanent_address.description: The permanent residence address of name

first_line.description: The first line of name's mailing address; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

second_line.description: The second line of name's mailing address

city.description: The city of name; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

state_or_province.description: The state or province of name; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

postal_code.description: The postal code of name; if country = US, this field must be 5 or 9 digits; if country = CA, this field must be in "LNLNLN", "LNL NLN", or "LNL-NLN" format; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country or stateOrProvince: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

tin.description: The U.S. tax identification number (TIN) associated with the name; the TIN must consist of 9 numerical digits, must not be sequential or repeating, must not begin with five zeros, and must not contain any alphabetic characters

ftin.description: The foreign tax identification number (“FTIN”) of name

ftin_not_legally_required.description: The user has indicated that they are legally not required to provide a FTIN; if false, FTIN is required

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of name; age must be between 0-130

has_certified.description: The user has certified under penalties of perjury all necessary certifications

signature.description: The signed name of signor (i.e., individual authorized to sign for name); signature must equal name

signature_timestamp.description: The date and time when the form was signed; the timestamp must be within 24 hours of the current UTC time

get.description: Returns the most recent W-9, W-8BEN, or W-8BEN-E data submission for an Account Owner

get.summary: Retrieve Tax Documentation Data by ID
get.description: Returns a specific W-9, W-8BEN, or W-8BEN-E data submission by its ID for an Account Owner

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The TaxBit internal UUID for the collected tax documentation data

parameters.name: unmask_tin
parameters.description: Whether to unmask the tin in the response; defaults to false

get.description: Returns the Tax Documentation Type and Status, TIN Verification Status, Issues, and Expiration Date (if applicable), for an Account Owner

id.description: The TaxBit internal UUID for the collected tax documentation data

document_type.description: The document type of the collected tax documentation data

status.description: The status of the latest Tax Documentation for the account owner

tin_verification_status.description: The status of the IRS TIN Match in the TaxBit system.

tin_verification_date.description: The date of the IRS TIN Match result

id.description: The TaxBit internal UUID for the collected tax documentation data

document_type.description: The document type of the collected tax documentation data

status.description: The status of the latest Tax Documentation for the account owner

issues.description: An array of issues related to Tax Documentation submissions

expiration_date.description: The expiration date of the latest Tax Documentation for an account owner

get.description: Returns the Comprehensive Tax Documentation Type and Status for an Account Owner. This status is specific to the DAC7 interview. For W-9, W-8BEN, and W-8BEN-E status, please refer to the tax-documentation-summary endpoint.

submission_status.description: The account owner's tax documentation submission status. If tax documentation has been submitted under the account owner, this value is 'SUBMITTED'.

data_collection_status.description: The DAC7 collection status. DAC7 Collection Status refers to the status of required information under DAC7 regulations.

expiration_date.description: The date when the DAC7 information collected expires.

vat_status.description: The VAT validation status indicates the outcome or condition of the tax-related Value Added Tax (VAT) verification process.

vat_validation_date.description: The date when the VAT number was validated.

post.description: Creates a W-9, W-8BEN, or W-8BEN-E PDF document for an Account Owner

id.description: The TaxBit internal UUID for the Tax Documentation document

status.description: The Tax Documentation document generation status

signature_timestamp.description: The date and time the Tax Documentation document was created

url.description: URL to download the Tax Documentation document

get.summary: Retrieve Tax Documentation Document by ID
get.description: Returns a W-9, W-8BEN, or W-8BEN-E PDF document by its ID for an Account Owner

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The TaxBit internal UUID for the Tax Documentation document
